modName: Rapport - Same sex discount Speech perk
summary: Adds a new perk to the Speech tree called Rapport. It is the opposite of Allure. It gives 10% better prices with the same sex.
descriptionHtml:
Please note: There will be no future updates. I have discontinued my support for this mod and ceased my involvement in modding. But if there\'s a bug or issue you would like to fix, or if you just want to improve it, feel free to edit the mod using the Creation Kit. Also in the discussion you are allowed to advertise mods based on the file, or better mods than these.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This mod adds a new perk to the Speech tree called Rapport. It requires 30 skill and is placed alongside Allure.

Allure is the perk which gives 10% better prices with the opposite sex. Rapport does the opposite and provides 10% better prices when trading with the same sex instead.

NOTE - You can potentially choose both Allure and Rapport... This is not what I desired - I only wanted to be able to choose one and not the other. But trying to exclude a perk after choosing another seems to break the perk tree and game, so I have had to settle for how it is currently.


All my mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27113]Make Master Harder[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28958]Potions Restore Over Time and No Spamming[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28326]Rapport - Same sex Speech discount[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29126]Easy Dual Staff Selection[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27954]Remove Annoying Level Up and Encumbered Messages[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27913]Animal Behaviour Tweaks[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27623]Alchemy Ingredient Effects Revealed[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28570]Smaller Frost Atronachs[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28876]Predators Attack Each Other[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29009]Horse Breathing Sound Removed[/url]
author: zyg0tic
